data.eml:eml: A study of the genus Agrilaxia Kerremans, 1903 from French Guiana (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Anthaxiini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bílý, Svatopluk (2017): A study of the genus Agrilaxia Kerremans, 1903 from French Guiana (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Anthaxiini). Zootaxa 4216 (1): 65-72, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.229828
